title: Unique Internet Problems
body: For 2 years, i have had no internet troubles while playing league, but my brother who plays league on his laptop, he either has ping spikes or he disconnects every 5 minutes. This only happens when he plays at my moms house whether I am playing at this same time or not. Anywhere else he goes he has fine ping. Any reason that could cause this and how to fix it?

replies.body:
It sounds like his specific location might be causing him to run into instability, and getting cut off from the game server.  Have him run through the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot this, and test it in a custom game.

Should his issue continue, ask him to reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll help him directly!  Good luck!
